body:
The newest update's headline feature is adding Base support, but Status v2.33 also includes another important integration with [Mercuryo](https://mercuryo.io/) as an in-app fiat on-ramp provider. This allows Status users to buy crypto directly from Mercuryo, including subscriptions or recurring purchases.

This release also expands on the Keycard support introduced in the [previous Status v2.32 update](https://status.app/blog/status-v2-32-launched-for-mobile-and-desktop), adding more Keycard-related functionality to Status Mobile.

# Full list of changes
## Features 

- Integrated Base chain
   - ([Pull Request #21876](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21876)). The user will be able to send, bridge, SWAP, and use DApps on Base, which is one of the most active Ethereum L2.
- Added Mercuryo on-ramp provider
  - ([Pull Request #21923](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21923)). The user will be able to buy crypto with Mercuryo on-ramp provider, including recurring crypto purchases
- Easy selection for Normal, Fast, Urgent fee. The user can quickly define how fast they want their transaction to go through by selecting the Normal, Fast, or Urgent fee option.
- Added price for the receiving token in SWAPs. The user will be able to see the approximate price for the receiving token when executing a SWAP.
- Added Swap and Buy crypto features to Wallet Portfolio view. The user will be able to start Buy or Swap from the Portfolio page
- Integrating Keycard
  - Keycard factory reset (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21914). The Keycard user will be able reset their Keycard via Status Mobile
  - Seed phrase can be imported into a new Keycard (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21947). The Keycard user will be asked for an empty Keycard and a recovery phrase. The key pair associated with the recovery phrase will be put on Keycard and they will be able to set up and use Status App with their Keycard.
  - Backup keycard can be created for same seed phrase (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21990). The Keycard user will be able to create a copy of Keycard with the same PIN via Mobile.
  - Keycard PIN can be changed (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/22008). The Keycard user will be able to change the PIN of their Keycard
  - Keycard unlocking (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/22030). The Keycard user will be able to unlock their Keycard with with the recovery phrase
  - Dapp interactions can be signed with keycard (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21785). The user will be able to interact with dApps through their Keycard.
  - Add Account on Keycard (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21753). The Keycard user will be able add another account to their Keycard.
 

## Improvements

- Keycard
  - Keycard signup UI improved (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21938)
  - Recovery phrase can be seen again during profile creation (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/22009)
  - Backup flow added to the Keycard migration flow and Keycard create user flow. That flow allows user to check that backup phrase was securely stored and can be recovered (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21893)
  - Added information about what is Keycard during onboarding (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21997)
  - Recovery phrase can be seen after canceling “Confirm Backup” drawer (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/22108)
- Skipped unnecessary account selection when user with one account starts Send from by scanning QR (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21899)
- Activity tab opens after collectible sent (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21909)
- User gets into the app immediately after sync and approving biometrics #21884 #21890
- Assets sorted by fiat balance and collectibles sorted by name (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21908)
- Added suggestion to update profile after the onboarding (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21862)
- EIP-3770 address format removed for simplicity (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21995)
- Show communities statistics on “Discover communities” page (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/22143)
- Send summary screen improved for readability (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/22067)


## Bug Fixes

- Fixed issue with starting Send flow from saved addresses (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21899)
- Keyboard doesn’t overlap suggestions and validation errors during recovery phrase entering (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21917)
- Fixed incorrect “keycard is not empty” message when card moved during profile creation (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21918)
- Fixed issue with incorrect derivation path displayed after upgrading from Status v1 (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21888)
- Fixed "cannot read property” error when dapp attempts to send a signature (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21873)
- Restored displaying of active status node in settings (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21901)
- Fixed issue with not updating profile photo until re-login #21931 #21795
- Fixed “context cancelled” error after using “back” button during sending collectibles (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21883)
- Fixed Java error at the end of failed migration to a Keycard (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21889)
- Fixed avatars blinking (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21782)
- Fixed issue with wrong QR code shown for contacts (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21949)
- Small UI fixes #21946 #22028 #22043 #22066 #22075 #22080 #22171 
- Fixed issue with immediate rejecting of dapp transactions (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21973)
- Fixed fee displaying for swap transactions (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/22001)
- Fixed sign message after dapp pairing (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/22026)
- Collectibles amount correctly updated after sending (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21867)
- Fixed issue with activity tab becoming empty (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21988)
- Fixed issue with transaction signed from auto-restored derived account (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/22040)
- Fixed issue with navigating to Bridge screen when user has only one account (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/22031)
- Fixed error when user approves swap after auto-refresh (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/22115)
- Fixed issues on keycard login flow (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/22182)
- Fixed biometrics are still active after profile migration to keycard (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/22146)
- Fixed error shown to user "Invalid hex data for private key" (https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/22082)

## Known issues
- users may experience this "java.lang.illegalArgumentException: 16 > 0" error when signing ERC-20 bridge transaction with keycard #21936. The team is actively working on a fix for upcoming releases.

#### Key Features:
- **Keycard Integration:**
  - Added the ability to sign Send, Bridge, and SWAP transactions with a Keycard, allowing users to confirm these transactions securely.
  - Introduced Keycard onboarding user flows:
    - **Create a new profile with an empty Keycard:** Enables users to set up the Status App with their empty Keycard.
    - **Login with Keycard:** Allows users to set up their Status App using their Keycard and Status key pair.
    - **Setup Keycard in App Settings:** Enables users to migrate the current profile key pair of their Status App to an empty Keycard, allowing them to use the Keycard to unlock their profile and sign transactions in the wallet.
- **Revamped and Simplified Onboarding Flows:**
  - Improved the “Start fresh” onboarding flow so users can set up a new Status App more quickly.
  - Enhanced the “Use a recovery phrase” onboarding flow so new users can set up a Status App with their Ethereum recovery phrase more efficiently.
  - Improved the “Log in with recovery phrase” onboarding flow so existing users can restore their Status profile using their recovery phrase faster.
  - Enhanced the “Log in by syncing” onboarding flow so users with an existing Status profile on another device can sync it with the Status mobile app more quickly.
- **Transaction History:**
  - Added transaction history, enabling users to view the history of transactions generated via Status.

#### Bugfixes and improvements:
- Fixed an issue with biometric login being disabled for multiple profiles due to unknown reasons, requiring the user to use a password to log in. Now, the users with  multiple status profiles won’t get their biometrics set-up turned off by Status due to unknown reasons.
- Improved the handling of offline states in Status, providing the user with more accurate and relevant data when the app is offline.
- Fixed an issue where the app could be killed or crash while in the background with push notifications enabled.
- Fixed a bug where the chat list was shared between different users.
- Fixed a problem where an empty account was randomly created.
- Improved performance for fetching the chat list for users who upgraded from v1 to v2.
- Fixed an issue where the app incorrectly displayed the setup screen despite being already set up.
- Resolved a delay in message history loading, which previously took up to 20 seconds.
- Fixed an issue where users could not tap on chats or channels after opening a profile link from a chat or viewing group details.
- Resolved a bug where the required popup did not display on a device syncing with another device multiple times using the seed phrase fallback.
- Fixed an issue where communities were being spectated even if the user had never opened them.
- Resolved incorrect drawer behavior for non-members in community chats.
- Fixed a bug where the group chat name was missing in the confirmation dialog for clearing history.
- Resolved an issue where the contact list reloaded when selecting or unselecting contacts on Android.
- Fixed a problem where the route was not rebuilt when decimals were changed or removed in fiat values on the send screen.

name: Status Mobile - 2.31.0
body:
## Summary

### Hero Feature

1. Users can now enjoy native token swaps for quick and efficient trades across Ethereum, Optimism, and Arbitrum networks.

### Bug Fixes

1. **Fix for decimal approvals** - Handles approval transactions with decimal issues. [#21326](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21326)
2. **Login profile display fix** - Resolves display issues for synced devices. [#21321](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21321)
3. **Fix for token-gated communities** - Resolves issues with joining options. [#21247](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21247)
4. **Delay in currency list fetching** - Fixes delay in loading currency data. [#21239](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21239)
5. **Error when sending ERC1155 collectibles** - Fixes sending errors for specific tokens. [#21209](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21209)
6. **Onboarding profile creation fix** - Resolves issues in creating profiles during onboarding. [#21170](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/21170)

Please, report issues/bugs in the `#feedback-mobile` channel on the Status community or via https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues.

name: Status Mobile - 2.30.0

name: Status Mobile - 2.29.0-beta
body:
Please note that this version is a **beta** meant for *testing* purposes by core contributors. It's not meant for real use and makes no claims of security or integrity of funds or data in these builds.

Please report issues/bugs in the `#general` channel on the status community or via:

https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues

## What's Changed
* chore(quo): add profile/extended collectible component by @J-Son89 in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19297
* [#18740] Increase debounce timing for fetching routes by @ulisesmac in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19100
* Fraschetti - Add wallet-get-address-details-contract-test by @FFFra in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19340
* Wallet: Keypair feature flag by @OmarBasem in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19333
* Feature/allow user to select a color for the group chat #18982 by @flexsurfer in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19088
* Upgrade `react native` to 0.73.5 by @siddarthkay in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18563
* Create Navigation mechanism for wizard type flows #19059 by @mmilad75 in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19123
* e2e: temp fix for jump to by @yevh-berdnyk in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19364
* Prevent a full nix derivation build for android when cljs code is updated and improve debug build speed by @siddarthkay in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19335
* fix input issues by @flexsurfer in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19341
* Tweak UI for contact request notifications by @seanstrom in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19337
* fix: very small token values are being displayed in scientific format by @ajayesivan in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19349
* Unable to enter/clear smoothly the data into contacts field #19384 by @flexsurfer in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19385
* [#18833] Confirm button disappearing while editing address by @ulisesmac in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19186
* Error when marking a community notification as read in the activity center #19388 by @ibrkhalil in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19390
* All addresses text is not updated when changing accounts by @ibrkhalil in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19379
* add empty check for keychain credentials server by @Parveshdhull in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19242
* Remove not-implemented box from sticker/emoji messages by @clauxx in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19255
* Fix chat spacings by @clauxx in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19015
* Remove 'Community admins will review your request' text from community overview screen by @ajayesivan in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19361
* Hide community channels when hide channels option is enabled by @ibrkhalil in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19378
* qualify onboarding screens keys by @J-Son89 in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19285
* fix: re-route a user's own profile link to their settings page by @seanstrom in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19389
* [Feature] Enable Test Networks by default on E2E and PR builds by @smohamedjavid in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19365
* [#19117] fix: setting over scroll shows gap by @mohsen-ghafouri in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19352
* Communities - Address for airdrops/permissions screen issues by @ibrkhalil in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19296
* ci: bump jenkins-lib to fix sepolia token typo by @jakubgs in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19415
* ci: make contract tests stage optional by @jakubgs in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19416
* [#18934] universal scanner in wallet receive by @ulisesmac in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19409
* Disable button when request is in flight by @cammellos in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19402
* fix: avatar alignment by @jo-mut in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19073
* [19159] Implement drawer action component #19159 by @Rende11 in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19289
* Flow for sending multiple collectibles by @vkjr in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19386
* Add toggle instead of checkbox for addresses for permissions sheet by @ibrkhalil in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19424
* chore: rename alias of promesa to be more verbose by @J-Son89 in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19332
* Update usage of Login/Create/Restore account by @seanstrom in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19420
* Check permissions even if there's an inflight request by @cammellos in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19439

* feat: contact CustomizationColor by @yqrashawn in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19087
* updated leave button background color to community color by @jo-mut in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19429
* e2e: updating PR pipeline by @churik in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19478
* updated community rules to display the actual rules by @jo-mut in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19044
* e2e: fixes after testet mode enabled changes by @yevh-berdnyk in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19498
* Use correct schema keyword by @ibrkhalil in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19522
* fix top bar disappearing when removing or blocking contact by @Parveshdhull in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19430
* [#19351] fix: animate username in profile by @mohsen-ghafouri in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19370
* Fix background color on communities/chat home by @ibrkhalil in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19520
* 🖇️ Connect getSavedAddresses RPC to show or hide save address button by @shivekkhurana in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19508
* fix: dismiss keyboard when opening a modal by @seanstrom in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19403
* Use scrollable multiline text-input in contact request form by @seanstrom in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19383
* Fix legacy settings seed backup  by @clauxx in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19487
* Improve navigate-to-jump-to by @Parveshdhull in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19434
* e2e: wallet tests added by @yevh-berdnyk in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/19477

name: Status Mobile - 2.28.0-beta
body:
Please report issues/bugs via:

https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues

## What's Changed
* Check eligibility status after enabling the share all current and future addresses toggle by @ajayesivan in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18870
* The last collectible is shown for a moment while opening a new collectible #18750 by @mmilad75 in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18793
* [#18545] Add missing linear gradient to dark themed cards by @ulisesmac in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18689

* hide eligibility when checking by @cammellos in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18878
* feat: new keypair: mnemonic, address, KP name screen by @OmarBasem in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18790
* Share community channel qr code by @Pau1fitz in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18807
* chore: fix few outdated things in docs & readme by @siddarthkay in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18920
* chore(schema): for user-avatar component by @yqrashawn in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18913
* ci: remove starting build of status.im website by @jakubgs in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18936
* e2e: temp - dict object error info by @yevh-berdnyk in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18918
* fix: sync qr code not visible by @qfrank in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18944

name: 1.26.0 (alpha)
body:
# Status Mobile - 1.26.0-alpha

##  Major improvements: 
- Includes the new shards community feature
- New deep/universal links https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17721
- Numerous fixes including issues related to message handling, chat behavior, and composer functionality
- Various fixes on design feedback (can be found [here](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aclosed+label%3A%22E%3ADesign+Feedback+1.25%22+))
- Sync flow optimisation and fixes https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17311 https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17342 https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17340 https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16852 https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17600 https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17731 https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17755
- Fixed issues related to token-gated communities https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17799 https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17901
- Implemented various UI components and fixes 
- Introduced wallet-related components and features, including wallet account creation, activity tab, network preferences etc. **Note** that new Wallet screen is still in progress and hidden. Longtap on wallet navigation tab to switch to the New Wallet screen
- removed/refactored bunch of legacy code


## Known issues: 
- Issues related to message reliability https://github.com/status-im/status-go/issues/4459 https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues/18284 https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues/18282 https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues/18301
- Android still has visible performance issues, that are logged here: https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues/16714. The issues have been investigated by @Parveshdhull, improvements will be included in next releases.

name: 1.25.0 (Alpha)
body:
# Status Mobile - 1.25.0-alpha

##  Major improvements: 
- Mute community feature https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/15161
- Various fixes on design feedback (can be found [here](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aclosed+label%3A%22E%3ADesign+Feedback+1.24%22))
- Fixing pulling images on the backend https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16976 
- Improving identicons in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16193
- Fixing flows for adding members to non-token-gated community in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16917
- Get rid of 3-random name in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17042
- Improved top bar in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17170
- Improved sync stability in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17226
- Improved animation in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16981
and added numerous components, bugfixes ...

## Known issues: 

- traffic consumption is still high
- there are 2 crashes that are hardly reproducible, but you may see them - IOS can crash when it gets back from the background or after generating keys - which should be fixed with RN upgrade PR in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17241  
- Android has visible performance issues, that are logged here: https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues/16714 - investigated and reported here https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues/16714#issuecomment-1776721533

## What's Changed 
* Update readme by @cammellos in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16619
* hide mutual update's system messages by @Parveshdhull in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16674
* e2e: save and share image tests by @yevh-berdnyk in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16692
* [161108] Optimize message styling when there's multiple mentions on top of each other by @ibrkhalil in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16505
* Fix failing mute till test by @ibrkhalil in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16453
* #16691 fix navigation to community from discover communities screen by @Parveshdhull in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16702
* Update go waku by @cammellos in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16689
* [#16703] The display name is not resolved in chats for user sender af… by @flexsurfer in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16704
* Mute community by @jo-mut in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/15161
* [Fix] Scroll to bottom on editing a message by @smohamedjavid in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16630
* Refactor `Bottom Sheet` to use Theme Context by @smohamedjavid in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16710
* e2e: TimeoutException by @churik in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16730
* feat: category quo2 component by @OmarBasem in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16713
* Refactor Button and correct use of community color by @J-Son89 in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16536
* [#16551] - shared community name in switcher by @ulisesmac in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16576
* Do not show biometrics onboarding screen if biometric is not available by @flexsurfer in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16744
* feat: browser input by @BalogunofAfrica in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16487
* feat: camera screen (1/2) by @OmarBasem in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/16569

name: 1.24.0 (Alpha)
body:
## Major improvements: 

- Light-client protocol enabled (affected message reliability, now fetching/re-sending is way faster and more efficient)
-  Numerous design fixes  / UI fixes discussed at Porto
-  Animations  

## Known issues: 

- traffic consumption is still high (around 150MB/per hour, but it is already a huge improvement) - will be reported to keep track of it and investigate further 
- there are 2 crashes that are hardly reproducible, but you may see them - the app may crash on generating keys (rare) or IOS can be crashed when it gets back from the background. We try to keep but on them and to get logs, but so far there is no pattern detected for reproducing it 
- Android has visible performance issues, that are logged here: https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues/16714
- Small but visible UI issue with counter https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues/16594   
…and many others that are logged into our repo.  

## What's Changed
* fix jump-to in the community screen is navigating to home screen instead of shell by @Parveshdhull in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/15647
* [15128] Introduce muting for a specific duration by @ibrkhalil in https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/15253
